New Records: Mohammed Shami took his 45th wicket at a World Cup, a new record for an Indian player
Key Match Events: India crushed Sri Lanka by 302 runs
Sri Lanka was bowled out for 55 in less than 20 overs
Kasun Rajitha was caught by Shreyas off the bowling of Jadeja

Miscellaneous Highlights: India remain unbeaten in the Cricket World Cup
India are now certain of a semi-final spot as they top the table with seven wins from seven
Sri Lanka are all but eliminated from the tournament after a fifth defeat from seven matches
